name: The Disappearance (SmallFootStudio)
description: Interact. Explore. Solve the Mystery. Austin is a private investigator who is addicted to pills as he struggles with anxiety.  One day, he is tasked with solving the mystery of a murder which hits close to home, the murder of his neighbor , Alex. Interact to find clues, explore in up to 3 levels and make choices that determine the outcome. Solve, the disappearance...
